# Tender Notice
## Request for Proposal
### Defence Research and Development Canada (DRDC)
**Project Title:**
Technical Support and Help Desk Services for Vehicle Armour and Anti-Armour Projects

**Reference Number:**
cb-103-86964854
**Amendment Number:**
1
**Solicitation Number:**
2024-00991

**Publication Date:** March 1, 2024
**Tender Closing Date:** March 20, 2024, at 2:00 PM (Eastern Time)
**Amendment Date:** March 20, 2024

**Brief Description:**
The Defence Research and Development Canada (DRDC), Valcartier Research Center, is seeking proposals for Technical Support and Help Desk Services for Vehicle Armour and Anti-Armour Projects. The services required are for one (1) TSPS resource category 5.7 – Personal Protection Equipment Technologist, Senior Level under Stream 5: Technical, Engineering and Maintenance Services (TEMS). This requirement aims to support the vehicle armour and anti-armour projects within the Weapon Effects and Protection (WEP) section.

**Contract Details:**
The contract will be awarded for one (1) year, with the option to extend the term by up to two (2) one-year option periods under the same conditions.

**Eligibility and Selection Criteria:**
The selection process will be based on a combined technical merit and price evaluation.

**Trade Agreements:**
The tender is open to proposals from suppliers that are registered under the following trade agreements:

* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)

**Contact Information:**
For further information or clarification, please contact Stephanie Lacroix, at:

Email: Stephanie.lacroix@forces.gc.ca
Phone: (581) 313-9126
Address: 2459 de la Bravoure Road, Quebec, QC, G3J 1X5
